entry.title: debian安装rabbitmq集群
entry.content: 环境准备 IP 主机名 172.16.17.71 node1 172.16.17.72 node2 172.16.17.73 node3 绑定host文件 添加rabbitmq源1echo "deb https://dl.bintray.com/rabbitmq/debian stretch main" | tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/bintray.rabbitmq.list 1wget -O- https://dl.bintray.com/rabbitmq/Keys/rabbitmq-release-signing-key.asc | apt-key add - 1wget -O- https://www.rabbitmq.com/rabbitmq-release-signing-key.asc | apt-key add - 安装elang源1234wget https://packages.erlang-solutions.com/erlang-solutions_1.0_all.debdpkg -i erlang-solutions_1.0_all.debapt-get updateapt-get install erlang 安装rabbitmq1apt-get install rabbitmq-server 设置节点互相验证：Erlang Cookie （重要）RabbitMQ节点和CLI工具（例如rabbitmqctl）使用cookie来确定它们是否被允许相互通信，要使两个节点能够通信，它们必须具有相同的共享密钥，称为Erlang Cookie.Cookie只是一个字符串，最多可以有255个字符。它通常存储在本地文件中。该文件必须只能由所有者访问（400权限）。每个集群节点必须具有相同的 cookie，文件位置/var/lib/rabbitmq/.erlang.cookie， 把rabbit2、rabbit3设置成和rabbit1一样的即可，权限是400 12345678root@node1:~# cat /var/lib/rabbitmq/.erlang.cookieUFLEZLRJKIDGKJKGLZRFroot@node2:~# cat /var/lib/rabbitmq/.erlang.cookieUFLEZLRJKIDGKJKGLZRFroot@node3:~# cat /var/lib/rabbitmq/.erlang.cookieUFLEZLRJKIDGKJKGLZRF 重启rabbtimq 1/etc/init.d/rabbitmq-server restart 查看集群状态 1234567rabbitmqctl cluster_statusCluster status of node rabbit@node1 ...[{nodes,[{disc,[rabbit@node1]}]}, {running_nodes,[rabbit@node1]}, {cluster_name,<<"rabbit@node1">>}, {partitions,[]}, {alarms,[{rabbit@node1,[]}]}] 设置集群首先，在rabbit@c1的簇中加入rabbit@c2 1、停止rabbir@c2的rabbitmq应用程序， 2、加入rabbit@c1集群 ​ 3、然后启动RabbitMQ程序 关闭 rabbitmq 应用node2 node3 123rabbitmqctl stop_apprabbitmqctl join_cluster rabbit@node1rabbitmqctl start_app 在查看集群状态 (node2 node3都已经加入集群) 1234567root@node1:~# rabbitmqctl cluster_statusCluster status of node rabbit@node1 ...[{nodes,[{disc,[rabbit@node1,rabbit@node2,rabbit@node3]}]}, {running_nodes,[rabbit@node3,rabbit@node2,rabbit@node1]}, {cluster_name,<<"rabbit@node1">>}, {partitions,[]}, {alarms,[{rabbit@node3,[]},{rabbit@node2,[]},{rabbit@node1,[]}]}]

entry.title: 基于centos搭建vsftpd3.0.3虚拟用户验证ftp服务器
entry.content: 下载vsftpd安装依赖包 1yum install gcc gcc-c++ db4-utils pam-devel libcap libcap-devel -y 编译安装 1234wget https://security.appspot.com/downloads/vsftpd-3.0.3.tar.gztar xf vsftpd-3.0.3.tar.gzcd vsftpd-3.0.3make && make install 1vim /etc/xinetd.d/vsftpd 将disable中no改成yes 创建目录 12mkdir /etc/vsftpd/cp vsftpd.conf /etc/vsftpd/ 添加启动脚本 vim /etc/init.d/vsftpd 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667686970717273747576#!/bin/bash## vsftpd This Shell script takes care of starting and stopping# standalone vsftpd.## chkconfig: - 60 50# description: Vsftpd is a ftp daemon, which is the program # that answers incoming ftp service requests.# processname: vsftpd# config: /etc/vsftpd/vsftpd.conf# Source function library.. /etc/rc.d/init.d/functions# Source networking configuration.. /etc/sysconfig/network# Check that networking is up.[ ${NETWORKING} = "no" ] && exit 0[ -x /usr/local/sbin/vsftpd ] || exit 0RETVAL=0prog="vsftpd"start() { # Start daemons. if [ -d /etc/vsftpd ] ; then for i in `ls /etc/vsftpd/*.conf`; do site=`basename $i .conf` echo -n $"Starting $prog for $site: " /usr/local/sbin/vsftpd $i & RETVAL=$? [ $RETVAL -eq 0 ] && { touch /var/lock/subsys/$prog success $"$prog $site" } echo done else RETVAL=1 fi return $RETVAL}stop() { # Stop daemons. echo -n $"Shutting down $prog: " killproc $prog RETVAL=$? echo [ $RETVAL -eq 0 ] && rm -f /var/lock/subsys/$prog return $RETVAL}# See how we were called.case "$1" in start) start ;; stop) stop ;; restart|reload) stop start RETVAL=$? ;; condrestart) if [ -f /var/lock/subsys/$prog ]; then stop start RETVAL=$? fi ;; status) status $prog RETVAL=$? ;; *) echo $"Usage: $0 {start|stop|restart|condrestart|status}" exit 1esacexit $RETVAL 创建虚拟用户vim vusers.list (虚拟用户账户列表) 1234zhangsan123456lisi123456 123db_load -T -t hash -f vusers.list vusers.db[root@localhost vsftpd]# file vusers.db vusers.db: Berkeley DB (Hash, version 9, native byte-order) db_load 命令 -T 允许非berkeley的程序使用该数据库 -t 指定算法（hash：哈希；散列）-f 指定源文件 生成数据库文件必须为”.db”格式 1chmod 600 vusers.* 增加虚拟生设账号更目录为ftp修改权限 12useradd -d /home/ftp/ -s /sbin/nologin virtualchmod 755 /home/ftp/ 增加pam认证vim /etc/pam.d/vsftpd.vu 12auth required pam_userdb.so db=/etc/vsftpd/vusersaccount required pam_userdb.so db=/etc/vsftpd/vusers 此处不用加.db 修改vsftpd.conf配置文件并重启 vim vsftpd.conf 1234567891011121314151617181920[root@localhost vsftpd]# cat vsftpd.conf |grep -v ^#anonymous_enable=NOlocal_enable=YESwrite_enable=YESlocal_umask=022anon_umask=022dirmessage_enable=YESxferlog_enable=YESconnect_from_port_20=YESxferlog_file=/var/log/xferlogxferlog_std_format=YESftpd_banner=Welcome to blah FTP service.listen=YESpam_service_name=vsftpd.vuguest_enable=YESguest_username=virtualuserlist_enable=YEStcp_wrappers=YESuser_config_dir=/etc/vsftpd/vusers.dir 创建虚拟用户目录 123mkdir vusers.dirtouch zhangsantouch lisi vim zhangsan 12345anon_upload_enable=YESanon_mkdir_write_enable=YESanon_other_write_enable=YESanon_max_rate=0local_root=/home/ftp/zhangsan 启动ftp服务1/etc/init.d/vsftpd start 测试链接 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425[root@localhost ~]# ftp 172.16.17.63Connected to 172.16.17.63 (172.16.17.63).220 Welcome to blah FTP service.Name (172.16.17.63:root): elink331 Please specify the password.Password:230 Login successful.Remote system type is UNIX.Using binary mode to transfer files.ftp> ls227 Entering Passive Mode (172,16,17,63,208,172).150 Here comes the directory listing.226 Directory send OK.ftp> pw257 "/"ftp> pwd257 "/"ftp> mkdir ceshi257 "/ceshi" createdftp> ls227 Entering Passive Mode (172,16,17,63,76,47).150 Here comes the directory listing.drwxr-xr-x 2 500 500 4096 Nov 15 07:24 ceshi226 Directory send OK.ftp>

entry.title: redis哨兵模式搭建以及问题解决
entry.content: 环境准备 操作系统 redis-server debian8 172.16.17.71:6379 debian8 172.16.17.72:6379 debian8 172.16.17.73:6379 编译安装redis1234wget http://download.redis.io/releases/redis-5.0.0.tar.gztar xf redis-5.0.0.tar.gz -C /usr/local/redis/cd /usr/local/redis/make && make install 创建配置文件123/usr/local/redis# mkdir -p /usr/local/redis/conf/usr/local/redis# cp redis.conf /usr/local/redis/conf//usr/local/redis# cp sentinel.conf /usr/local/redis/conf/ 修改配置文件redis-master配置文件修改1234561.port 63792.daemonize yes 守护线程启动3.bind 0.0.0.0 4.pidfile /var/run/redis-6379.pid5.logfile /var/log/redis-6379.log6.protected-mode no 关闭保护模式 redis-slave 配置文件修改12345671.port 63792.daemonize yes 守护线程启动3.bind 0.0.0.0 4.pidfile /var/run/redis-6379.pid5.logfile /var/log/redis/redis-6379.log6.protected-mode no 关闭保护模式7.slaveof 172.16.17.71 6379 比redis主多这一行（指定master地址） redis-server 启动先启动redis-master再启动两个slave从 1redis-server /usr/local/redis/conf/redis.conf 查看日志已经看到两个slave连接到master1234567891011125667:M 15 Nov 2018 11:42:51.954 * Replica 172.16.17.72:6379 asks for synchronization5667:M 15 Nov 2018 11:42:51.954 * Full resync requested by replica 172.16.17.72:63795667:M 15 Nov 2018 11:42:51.955 * Starting BGSAVE for SYNC with target: disk5667:M 15 Nov 2018 11:42:51.955 * Background saving started by pid 56795679:C 15 Nov 2018 11:42:52.016 * DB saved on disk5679:C 15 Nov 2018 11:42:52.017 * RDB: 0 MB of memory used by copy-on-write5667:M 15 Nov 2018 11:42:52.117 * Background saving terminated with success5667:M 15 Nov 2018 11:42:52.118 * Synchronization with replica 172.16.17.72:6379 succeeded5667:M 15 Nov 2018 11:45:32.785 * Replica 172.16.17.73:6379 asks for synchronization5667:M 15 Nov 2018 11:45:32.785 * Full resync requested by replica 172.16.17.73:63795667:M 15 Nov 2018 11:45:32.786 * Starting BGSAVE for SYNC with target: disk5667:M 15 Nov 2018 11:45:32.787 * Background saving started by pid 5681 查看主从复制情况redis-cli -p 6379 info replication 12345678910111213# Replicationrole:masterconnected_slaves:2slave0:ip=172.16.17.72,port=6379,state=online,offset=420,lag=1slave1:ip=172.16.17.73,port=6379,state=online,offset=420,lag=0master_replid:aff1b5cdfe6e4943dac32abd8270f21eb6b80c87master_replid2:0000000000000000000000000000000000000000master_repl_offset:420second_repl_offset:-1repl_backlog_active:1repl_backlog_size:1048576repl_backlog_first_byte_offset:1repl_backlog_histlen:420 redis同步测试master执行 12root@node1:~# redis-cli -p 6379 set aaa 111OK slave执行 12root@node2:~# redis-cli -p 6379 get aaa"111" 12root@node3:~# redis-cli -p 6379 get aaa"111" redis的高可用部署（redis-sentinel）编辑redis-sentinel配置文件 root@node1:/usr/local/redis/conf# vim sentinel.conf 123456789101.port 263792.sentinel monitor mymaster 172.16.17.71 6379 23.sentinel down-after-milliseconds mymaster 50004.sentinel parallel-syncs mymaster 15.sentinel failover-timeout mymaster 15000追加6.daemonize yes #守护进程模式7.logfile "/var/log/redis/sentinel.log"8.pidfile "/var/run/sentinel.pid"9.protected-mode no 配置文件说明 12345678910（1）sentinel monitor mymaster 172.16.17.71 6379 2 mymaster 监控主节点名字（随便写） 172.16.17.71 6379 主节点的ip根端口 2 一共两台sentinel 发生问题会自动故障转移（2）sentinel down-after-milliseconds mymaster 5000 （5秒） 当master 当即多久后检查 (3) sentinel parallel-syncs mymaster 1 设定sentinel并发还是串行，1代表每次只能复制一个，可以减轻master压力 (4) sentinel failover-timeout mymaster 15000（15秒） 表示故障转移的超时时间 启动redis-sentinel三台都启动 1redis-sentinel /usr/local/redis/conf/sentinel.conf & 启动后查看sentinel信息 1root@node1:/usr/local/redis/conf# redis-cli -p 26379 info sentinel 1234567# Sentinelsentinel_masters:1sentinel_tilt:0sentinel_running_scripts:0sentinel_scripts_queue_length:0sentinel_simulate_failure_flags:0master0:name=mymaster,status=ok,address=172.16.17.71:6379,slaves=2,sentinels=3 (2从3sentinel) 报错一12345WARNING overcommit_memory is set to 0! Background save may fail under low memory condition. To fix this issue add 'vm.overcommit_memory = 1' to /etc/sysctl.conf and then reboot or run the command 'sysctl vm.overcommit_memory=1' for this to take effect.解决办法vim /etc/sysctl.confvm.overcommit_memory=1 添加这一行sysctl -p 报错二1234WARNING you have Transparent Huge Pages (THP) support enabled in your kernel. This will create latency and memory usage issues with Redis. To fix this issue run the command 'echo never > /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled' as root, and add it to your /etc/rc.local in order to retain the setting after a reboot. Redis must be restarted after THP is disabled解决办法 （root下）echo never > /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled并且将它写入到 /etc/rc.local下 错误三12345WARNING: The TCP backlog setting of 511 cannot be enforced because /proc/sys/net/core/somaxconn is set to the lower value of 128.解决办法vim /etc/sysctl.confnet.core.somaxconn = 1024sysctl -p

entry.title: 用脚本连接postgres方法
entry.content: ​ 由于要每天备份数据库为了不妨碍主库所以我需要指定连接数据库 。这样就在脚本连接的时候我需要数据密码。 PGPASSWORD 环境变量12export PGPASSWORD="123456"pg_dump -U test testdb > /backup/testdb.bak 案例 12345678910111213141516171819202122#!/bin/bash 8 export PGPASSWORD="123456" 9 IP=172.16.17.63 10 name=`date +"%Y%m%d"` 11 bakhome=/opt/dbbak 13 find $bakhome -name "*.tar.gz" -mtime +7 >$bakhome/temp.log 14 if [ -s $bakhome/temp.log ];then 15 echo '超出备份周期，删除超出部分文件' 16 cd $bakhome 17 cat $bakhome/temp.log | while read line 18 do 19 rm -rf $line 20 done 21 echo "开始备份数据库" 22 pg_dump -h $IP -U postgres elink -f $bakhome/elink.dump 23 if [ $? -eq 0 ];then 24 cd $bakhome && tar -zcvf elink-$name.tar.gz elink.dump 25 if [ $? -eq 0 ];then 26 rm -rf $bakhome/elink.dump 27 fi 28 fi 29 fi

entry.title: shell脚本编程
entry.content: 简单的查看内核的脚本12345678[root@localhost dingyi]# vim first.sh#!/bin/bash#查看系统内核信息cd /bootecho "当前路径"pwdecho "内核信息"ls -lh vml* 简单的备份脚本$0 保存脚本的名称 $# 保存脚本处理的参数 $* 处理了脚本的所有参数 1234567891011121314[root@localhost dingyi]# vim mybak.sh#!/bin/bash#备份脚本tar zcf ./mybak_$(date +%F-%T).tar.gz $* &>/dev/nullecho "已执行 $0 脚本"echo "共完成 $# 个对象的备份"echo "具体包括：$*" 执行脚本[root@localhost dingyi]# ./mybak.sh /etc/passwd /etc/shadow已执行 ./mybak.sh 脚本共完成 2 个对象的备份具体包括：/etc/passwd /etc/shadow[root@localhost dingyi]# lsfirst.sh mybak_2018-05-03-01:37:56.tar.gz mybak.sh 环境变量123456789101112131415161718[root@localhost dingyi]# vim read.sh#!/bin/bashread -p "请输入您的姓名" nameread -p "请输入您的密码" passwdif [ $passwd = "123123" ]; then echo "您好 $name ! " else echo "抱歉，您输入的密码不正确！"fi执行脚本[root@localhost dingyi]# ./read.sh 请输入您的姓名丁一 请输入您的密码123123您好 丁一 ! [root@localhost dingyi]# ./read.sh 请输入您的姓名丁一请输入您的密码12312111抱歉，您输入的密码不正确！

entry.title: routeros
entry.content: 用户管理查看用户名1[admin@MikroTik] > /user print 修改用户名密码 进入user 目录下 修改 admin密码为123456 1[admin@MikroTik] /user> set admin password=123456 账号分组权限full最高权限、write普通管理，没有ftp、policy权限、policy权限及无法修改任何账号密码包括当前账号，Read 权限除了不能上传文件和修改密码外， 不能写入任何的配置， 即只能登陆设备查看。 创建用户 备份与恢复123[admin@MikroTik] > system backup save name=dingyi Saving system configurationConfiguration backup saved 查看备份1[admin@MikroTik] > file print 备份恢复1234[admin@MikroTik] > system backup load name=dingyi.backup password: ******Restore and reboot? [y/N]: y 导出一个脚本 导出一个包含ip的脚本 12345678[admin@MikroTik] > ip address export file=address[admin@MikroTik] > file print # NAME TYPE SIZE CREATION-TIME 0 longlyjck.backup backup 8.6KiB mar/21/2018 16:45:26 1 address.rsc script 145 mar/21/2018 16:47:07 2 primary-slave disk jan/11/2015 05:27:23 3 skins directory jan/27/2015 13:24:04 4 dingyi.backup 123456[admin@MikroTik] > export compact # mar/21/2018 16:50:48 by RouterOS 6.32.3# software id = ZJ3M-ESHW#/ip addressadd address=10.0.0.1/24 interface=ether2 network=10.0.0.0 将生成的配置文件导入系统 1[admin@MikroTik] > import address.rsc 系统复位1234[admin@MikroTik] > /system reset-configuration Dangerous! Reset anyway? [y/N]: ysystem configuration will be reset 复位时可带 keep-users 指令， 描述如下:Keep-users – 复位不删除管理用户账号no-defaults - 不加载任何默认配置， 清空所有skip-backup - 当 yes 被指定， 自动备份将不会再复位前创建run-after-reset - 在 run after reset 指定后 export 档后， 复位会导入指定的 RouterOS 脚本配置文件。 日志管理查看，默认的进行日志类型 action 都是 memory，即存储在内容， 当路由器重启后会自动清除。 1234567[admin@MikroTik] > system logging print Flags: X - disabled, I - invalid, * - default # TOPICS ACTION PREFIX 0 * info memory 1 * error memory 2 * warning memory 3 * critical echo 为保证日志内被存储下来， 并汇出用于分析， 可设置日志存在到本地磁盘中， 我们将 info 日志类型设置action=disk， 即存储在本地磁盘， 配置如下 123[admin@MikroTik] > system logging set 0 action=disk[admin@MikroTik] > system logging set 1 action=disk [admin@MikroTik] > system logging set 2 action=disk

entry.title: ambari-agent节点丢失以及无法注册
entry.content: ambari-agent节点丢失经过从官方查询是因为python2.7.5.48造成的 。升级或者降级都可以解决。也可以关闭python验证。 centos7.4 安装ambari注册时候会在页面上无法注册也是这个问题 [SSL: CERTIFICATE_VERIFY_FAILED] certificate verify failed (_ssl.c:579) 解决办法1sed -i 's/^verify.*/verify=disable/' /etc/python/cert-verification.cfg 重启ambari-agent就可以了
